_header: In time of weal think on thy woe
Title(s): ‘In die bonorum non immemor sis malorum’
_description: ‘In die bonorum non immemor sis malorum’ — a single couplet

BLHar7322.Transcription:
In time of wele þenke on þi wofor þe wele of þis
                    world wole sone go
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.
